data.description: Get ready to score big with the ultimate and unique sports app!  Dive into our virtual museum, dribble your way across the iconic Bloomfield pitch, and catch all the action in exclusive 360-degree videos. But it doesn't stop there!  Treat yourself to a shopping spree like never before, with goodies that'll make any fan jump for joy! Whether you're a seasoned supporter or just joining the game, our app guarantees non-stop excitement at every turn. Join the party and experience sport

We have further optimized the app Shop and Fanzone module to get more FPS.

We have increased the FPS count in interactive store and Fan zone. We have achieved more than 70 FPS as requested. And as per the guideline we need to maintain 60 FPS for App Labs. 
Kindly review the app as we have a launch on 10th April. ��

Justification Notes: RECORD_AUDIO: This permission is used for communicating with other players/users. WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission is used for storing video file into local storage. READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission is used for playing video file into local storage. ACCESS_MEDIA_LOCATION: This permission is used for picking the video files from storage.
